title: The changing society of the black Caribs : a study of the origins and political, economic, and social history up to 1960 of a minority group, namely those black Caribs who originated in St. Vincent and were deported to Ruatan and thence spread along the Central American coast as far as the Mosquito Shore and British Honduras
imprint: M Litt thesis for Oxford University
author: C. J. M. R. Gullick
